column1: Uncategorized;Phnom Penh: A fire broke out in a condominium building due to an electric malfunction
column2: prompting the fire brigade to intervene.------The incident happened at 10:30 AM on August 7
column3: 2020 at the DE CASTLE building along Street 315 in Sangkat Boeung Kak II
